summary: Implements a deprecated Stable Diffusion pipeline specialized for model editing tasks, integrating LoRA and textual inversion loading, VAE image processing, safety checking, and scheduling to generate edited images from prompts.
business_intent: Offer a high‑level API that enables developers to apply fine‑tuned or auxiliary models (e.g., LoRA, textual inversion) to Stable Diffusion for customizable image editing and creative generation workflows.
